pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Exterior Calculus // Provides functionality for working with differentials, k-forms, wedge products, Stokes's theorem, and related concepts from the exterior calculus. Functionality for Grassman algebra is provided. The canonical reference would be: M. Spivak (1965, ISBN:0-8053-9021-9) "Calculus on Manifolds". The 'stokes' package was formerly known as the 'wedge' package.
